item.description:
Roman Media Inc is holding an official end of the year PARTY to celebrate the success of their Production Company!! Lets celebrate with them and help them raise their Post Production goal to finish their feature length, psychological thriller, MILWOOD.

Tix are available at

http://romanmediainc-eac2.eventbrite.com/


It would be great to have our group out for a fun night out in the city. They will have several professional photographers at the event so we will have lots of great photos of the evening to look back on. Space is limited so lets RSVP soon to be a part of the event.

In order to be able to RSVP you'd need to purchase your ticket first as we need to let the event planners know how many of us are contributing to their fund raiser.

 

Feel free to invite friends or SO!!

 

 

Lots of prizes and raffles!! : )

______________________________________

*Red Sox/ Yankee Tickets (behind home plate)

*Autographed Sports Memorabilia

* Limited Edition Nintendo Wii (plus games)

* Keurig Coffee Machine (plus K Cups)

* Retro Pop Corn Machine and Free Movie Tickets

* Glenlivet Bottle and Glass Set

more to come....
item.name: Red Carpet Event!! Roman Media is celebrating!!
